welcome_message_body: Welcome to Herzliyya, a charming city known for its beautiful beaches, vibrant nightlife, and rich culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Herzliyya has to offer during your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sde Dov Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Sde Dov Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Ben Gurion International Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The main and largest terminal at Ben Gurion International Airport, handling most international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the designated network.
